name: The Exam XP
description:
THE TEACHER IS GONE!!

Your objective is to enter in his PC and find THE EXAM

Do it before he comes back... you have 20 minutes!


CONTROLS

YOU HAVE TO PAY ATENTION AT EVERYTHING.READ and CLICK!!!!!

Important info : There are clues on icons and carpets. Be aware ;)

You have the time you have left under the desktop.

We recommend to have some paper and pencil. It will help to resolve the PUZZLE.

CREDITS

Gerard Coquard
Hector Vergel
Cora Real
Jan de Nobel
Nil Muns

The Exam XP is a game for a Tecnocampus university GameJam 2021.
This game is made in LUA and LOVE2D.

We hope you enjoy a lot!
